title: The Good, The Bad, and the League: 4/11 - 4/17
body:
*Preamble*

_Your weekly dose of server problem-os, NA League news, and other!_

The League Client is moving to a new storage design (making your local install better) soon, LCS Finals went to a full 5 games (games 3 and 5 were awesome), and everyone loves Riven again!

**Follow-Ups:**

* **Mac voice still not working properly** Reached out to Apple for assistance. 

**Server Stuff: **

* **Patch Failure rate exceeding 5% (4/13, ~2 hours)** Automated alerting notifies the NOC patching failures reach excessive levels. Investigation leads to a download node not sending data correctly. Before 3rd party vendor can investigate said node, the node self-recovers and failure rates lower to normal levels. 

**Game Stuff: **

* **Wrong F2P Schedule (4/16, ~2 hours)** F2P rotation for the week rolls out, with Evelynn free instead of Vel’Koz. The Agony’s Embrace will have to wait a little bit before being able to hug everyone, and instead we’re all being watched by the Eye of the Void. He doesn’t blink much. 

**Player Support Issues:**

There’s a pretty stable amount of similar problems across the board in Player Support. We are also launching the new League Patcher, which should improve a bunch of things, as well as prevent you from needing to allow League through your firewall with each patch! Read about it [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/360015621174-New-League-patcher) and if you want to adjust your firewall one or two final times for the client, look [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3)

Morgageddon & Couch Commando
